resources.string: This application is for android devices. Tic Tac Toe is also known as Zero & Cross. When I was in school, I had played this game a lot in my free time and sometimes during classes too. So I decided that I should make an app for this game and I did. So I can play this game. Here\'s the game you installed. It is a tricky board game for a single player who will compete with a computer player and which required a high level of intelligence to won against a computer player. And I can also bet you that you could not beat a computer player.
1. The game is played on a grid that\'s 3 squares by 3 squares.
2. You are O, and the computer is X. Players take turns putting their marks in empty squares.
3. The first player to get 3 of her marks in a row (up, down, across, or diagonally) is the winner.
4. When all 9 squares are full, the game is over. If no player has 3 marks in a row, the game ends in a tie.
